Reference

All functions

barplot_usq()

Basic barplots using USQ colours and typography

boxplot_usq()

Basic boxplots using USQ colours and typography

hist_usq()

Basic histograms using USQ colours and typography

plot_usq()

Basic X-Y plotting using USQ colours and typography

scale_colour_usq()

ggplot2 colour scale constructor for USQ colours

scale_fill_usq()

ggplot2 fill scale constructor for USQ colours

theme.usq-package

Provides USQ style typography, colours and themes for plots from R

theme_usq()

A ggplot2 Theme Based on USQ Visual Identity and Typography Guidelines

usq_colours

USQ colours

usq_cols()

Function to extract USQ colours as hex codes

usq_pal()

Return function to interpolate a USQ colour palette

usq_palettes

Palettes of USQ colours
